answer: The overall objective of this study is to determine whether daily supplementation with the dietary supplement Cardioflex for 90 days will reduce risk factor biomarkers for CVD in adults aged 30–65 years old.  { "answer": "The overall objective of this study is to determine whether daily supplementation with the dietary supplement Cardioflex for 90 days will reduce risk factor biomarkers for CVD in adults aged 30–65 years old.", }
